Html:
Rawr - Cat

Survivability Points - Currently says "One thousandth of your health"
Unless this is configurable and I have it set differently, it's currently showing one five hundredth of my health.

Overall Points - Currently says "... Overall Points will always be identical to DPS points"
Except it's not, it includes survivability points

Also it would be nice if Rawr - Cat included the feature Rawr - Mage has, a user configurable "Survivability Rating" to weight +stam points.
Ah, those labels are left-overs from old version. I'll see about updating those. May make survivability customizable, we'll see.
